scenario 1.background: Keith has noticed that Elizabeth has been unusually curt with him over the past few days. He believes that she might be upset with him, possibly due to a misunderstanding or a mistake he made unknowingly.

dialogue.Keith: I understand you're going through a tough time. If you need someone to talk to, I'm here. Maybe a coffee break might help a bit?

scenario 4.background: After suggesting professional help, Keith notices that Elizabeth becomes slightly withdrawn. He believes his suggestion might have embarrassed her, and he feels regretful.

dialogue.Keith: I hope I didn’t overstep earlier suggesting professional help. I just want to make sure you know I’m here to support you, no matter what.

scenario 5.background: Following their last conversation, Elizabeth seems to be more open and appreciative of Keith's concern. Keith believes that she values his support and feels more comfortable around him now. He intends to maintain this supportive relationship.
